text: Yisrael Beiteinu, Hebrew: ישראל ביתנו , meaning Israel Our Home, is an Israeli political party. Its ideology is right-wing conservative, nationalist, populist, secular, and Zionist. Its focus is especially Jews originating from the former Soviet Union. Political leader is Avigdor Lieberman. Yisrael Beiteinu was founded by Lieberman in 1999. Number of seats in the 24th Knesset: 7 (/). Participating in the Fourth Netanyahu Government and the Bennett-Lapid Government. == Other websites == * Category:1999 establishments Category:1990s establishments in Israel Category:Political parties in Israel Category:Zionist parties Category:Conservative parties
title: Yisrael Beiteinu
